title: For some girls' soccer teams, uphill battle in Suburban Council
content: Albany Times UnionFor some girls' soccer teams, uphill battle in Suburban CouncilAlbany Times Union"Take away a few mistakes, and it's different," the Troy girls' soccer coach said of the early season defeat by Mohonasen. "You learn pretty fast here, if you give these teams an inch, they'll take three goals." The learning curve must feel like it ...
